channel.description: Resources Resource Type: User from Puppet Resource Tips and Examples: Package on Windows from Puppet Managing Windows Configurations from Puppet Puppet on Windows Pack from Puppet Forge Installing and Using Windows Modules from Puppet download_file Module from Puppet Forge Running Puppetâ€™s Commands on Windows from Puppet Using User and Group on Windows from Puppet puppetlabs-acl Module on Puppet Forge Video Script Here are a few hints for completing Lab 2, based on the struggles some students have had during previous semesters.
